alert.note: Alert for DeWitt; Gonzales; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:00PM CDT until April 05 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central DeWitt County in south central Texas... Southeastern Gonzales County in south central Texas... Northwestern Lavaca County in south central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hochheim, or 10 miles west of Yoakum, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Yoakum, Hallettsville, Shiner, Hochheim, Cheapside, Komensky, Worthing, Henkhaus, Moravia, Breslau, Mont, Sweet Home, Dreyer, Witting, Mount Olive, Wied and Concrete. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
